p: F. alnus and P. harmala extracts, as well as quercitrin, trifolin, and cynaroside, reduced the accumulation of ROS in treated cells compared to control using H 2DCFDA fluorescence ( Figure 4). The highest reduction of ROS was found when using trifolin, and cynaroside in all cells after 90 min of incubation. H 2O 2 showed the highest accumulation of ROS cancer cells.
